Translations.Text: waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasulihi wataʿmal salihan nu'tiha ajraha marratayni wa-aʿtadna laha riz'qan kariman
yanisaa l-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina l-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhdaʿna bil-qawli fayatmaʿa alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan maʿrufan

waqarna fi buyutikunna wala tabarrajna tabarruja l-jahiliyati l-ula wa-aqim'na l-salata waatina l-zakata wa-atiʿ'na l-laha warasulahu innama yuridu l-lahu liyudh'hiba ʿankumu l-rij'sa ahla l-bayti wayutahhirakum tathiran
wa-udh'kur'na ma yut'la fi buyutikunna min ayati l-lahi wal-hik'mati inna l-laha kana latifan khabiran

inna l-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati wal-sadiqina wal-sadiqati wal-sabirina wal-sabirati wal-khashiʿina wal-khashiʿati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati wal-saimina wal-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wal-dhakirina l-laha kathiran wal-dhakirati aʿadda l-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran ʿaziman
